review_data.title: Maravilloso

review_data.title: WAAAAY to expensive, even in Zurich!
review_data.content: Do not speak English, nor (well) German, nor French. CHF 12.- for patatoes tapas in a very small portion......NO COMMENT! Taking (non spannish?) people for full. Zurich is full a good restaurant with fair prices, this one does not deserve us!

review_data.title: Hervorragend
review_data.content: Sehr gute authentische Küche. Familiäre Atmosphäre. Typisch spannisches Restaurant. Gutes Preis-/Leistungsbverhältnis

review_data.title: Poor service
review_data.content: The bar/restaurant has been refurnished and now is a bit more modern and comfortable. But the service is still quite poor. Last time I was there I had to wait for almost one hour to get my dinner. It was a really chaotic and frustrating...More

review_data.title: Hervorragende spanische Küche
